name: Issue New Password
description: Generates and e-mails new passwords to selected members. Please update the 'email_template.html' file found in the criteria action's directory if required. Note that the standard email header and footer will <u>NOT</u> be added to the outgoing email.

input.label: E-Mail Subject
input.name: subject
input.description: What should the outgoing email subject read as?
input.value: We've issued you a new password.

input.label: Custom Message
input.name: message
input.description: Would you like to include a custom message to members in the password reset email?
